Text:
oh my god. I have been looking for this forever. I saw this back in the day on USA's "Up All Night" and, it's sad to say, it scared me very bad.

I know its gunna be laughable to watch it now but its a good trip down memory lane.  

Thanks TvTeam....I will comment on quality when I'm done downloading.

very good...well considering the how the movie was filmed
